testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorMaintenanceHistoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.1.7 [Need for Detector History] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Detector Maintenance History Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.2.4.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N24R492_Send_Detector_Maintenance_History_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N24R492_Send_Detector_Maintenance_History_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Detector History is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R498_Restrictions___Detector_History_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R498_Restrictions___Detector_History_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Station - Detector History is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R499_Detector_Station___Detector_History_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R499_Detector_Station___Detector_History_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R500_Detector_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R500_Detector_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Installation Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R501_Installation_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R501_Installation_Date_and_Time_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Calibration Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R502_Detector_Calibration_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R502_Detector_Calibration_Date_and_Time_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Calibration Method is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R503_Detector_Calibration_Method_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R503_Detector_Calibration_Method_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operational Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R504_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R504_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Non-Operational Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R505_Non_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R505_Non_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Repair is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R506_Description_of_Repair_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R506_Description_of_Repair_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether History Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.4.3.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R507_History_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R507_History_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N24R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N24R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 17 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorMaintenanceHistoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N24R492_Send_Detector_Maintenance_History_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 18 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 18.1 VERIFY that a detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg message was received.
Step 18.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item
Step 18.3 VERIFY that a detector-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.4 IF TMDD_N24R498_Restrictions___Detector_History_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.4.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item
Step 18.5 IF TMDD_N24R499_Detector_Station___Detector_History_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.5.1 VERIFY that a station-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.6 IF TMDD_N24R500_Detector_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.6.1 VERIFY that a detector-type data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.7 IF TMDD_N24R501_Installation_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 18.7.1 VERIFY that a detector-installation-date data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.8 IF TMDD_N24R502_Detector_Calibration_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.8.1 VERIFY that a detector-calibration-date data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.9 IF TMDD_N24R503_Detector_Calibration_Method_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 18.9.1 VERIFY that a detector-calibration-method data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.10 IF TMDD_N24R504_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 18.10.1 VERIFY that a detector-last-operational-date data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.11 IF TMDD_N24R505_Non_Operational_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 18.11.1 VERIFY that a detector-last-non-operational-date data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.12 IF TMDD_N24R506_Description_of_Repair_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 18.12.1 VERIFY that a detector-repair-description data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.13 IF TMDD_N24R507_History_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.13.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorMaintenanceHistoryMsg.detector-maintenance-history-item.detector-history-list.detector
Step 18.14 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 19 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 19.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 19.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 19.7 IF TMDD_N24R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 19.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20 EXIT
